participant_1.background:
I lost my dog this year, but I still have my karaoke machine and bow and arrows.
My Impala is the only thing I have to show for my life.
i have a pet skunk.
I am close to my family.
i love sushi.

participant_2.background:
My most valuable thing is my collection of Celtics memorabilia.
I do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy.
i do not have a good social life.
i have a pug named corky.
i have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.

content.text: Hi, I'm interested in making new friends. I've lost my dog this year and I'm looking for someone to talk to.
Hi! I'm sorry to hear that about your dog. I have a pug named Corky. He's a great dog and I love him very much.
Pugs are so cute! I love their little faces.
Yeah, they're pretty adorable. I'm glad you like him.
I am close with my family, what about you?
I don't have a good social life. My family lives far away from me and I don't have many friends.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm close with my family and I have a few good friends.
My most valuable thing is my collection of Celtics memorabilia. I've been collecting it since I was a kid and it means a lot to me.
That's really cool. I don't have any collections like that.
It's fun to have something to collect. It gives you something to look forward to and it's a good way to remember the good times.
That's a good point. I'll have to think about starting a collection of something.
That would be fun! You could collect anything you want. It could be anything from sports memorabilia to stamps to coins.
I'm not sure what I would collect. I'll have to think about it.
There's no rush. You can take your time and find something that you really like.
Thanks for the advice. I appreciate it.
No problem. I'm always happy to help.
